reviewTitle: Everyone is impressed when they listen to it.
reviewDescription: I needed a really small and portable BT speaker so i got this. I just wanted to play some music while i am working and that was all. But whenever my friends/relatives come to my place and see this they would doubt the quality/loudness of this speaker. So i play music on it loud enough and they are impressed with the sound quality, clarity and say it is loud enough for a speaker this size. Many of them have even gone ahead and bought one for themselves after seeing this. I already have a really great BT speaker. Feels like i got more than i asked for. Thanks to JBL.

reviewTitle: Meets basic expectations of a portable speaker
reviewDescription: The sound quality is good, but not extraordinary. I did not experience any good bass or relevant features while playing purely instrumental songs.
